item.title: Subwords as Skills: Tokenization for Sparse-Reward Reinforcement Learning
item.description: This paper introduces Subwords as Skills (SaS), a fast and efficient skill extraction method for sparse-reward reinforcement learning that uses tokenization. SaS enables 1000x faster skill extraction…
